title: "truffle unbox react" fails on Ubuntu 20.04

* Ethereum client: geth 1.9.21-stable / solc 0.7.1+commit.f4a555be.Linux.g++
* Truffle version (`truffle version`): v5.1.45
* node version (`node --version`): v10.19.0
* npm version (`npm --version`): 6.14.4

We can probably close this as duplicate of #3390?

Should probably first verify that it's @truffle/contract that's the problem here, though.
Just to confirm as per the other issue installing 'git' first fixes this.
